testcase.classname: As an administrator (admin) I want to be able to create a new todo record via API connection.
testcase.name: admin Send a GET a request is sent with an unregistered (update) (id), the status code returned is 203 and the message in the response body is "there is no deliveryman with this id".
testcase.system-out: * The api user sets "aapi/todo/status-update/{id}" path parameters..........passed * The api user sends a "GET" request and saves the returned response........passed * The api user verifies that the status code is 203.........................passed * The api user verifies that the "message" information in the response body is "there is no deliveryman with this id"..passed
